of the Landgren and Collins Families

Family Tree Lineage Index
Anders Danielsson

On October 24, 1805, Anders Danielsson was born in Lyngby parish, Malmöhus county to Elna Hansdotter and Daniel Jorensson (1A). Anders lived with his family in No. 6 Lyngby village/farm in Lyngby parish for twenty years (1B, 1C, 1D, 1E). During his time in Lyngby, Anders’s father died in 1820 at the age of 54. A year later, Nils?? Larsson became the head of the household, aged 29 (1D). Anders moved away five years later to Michelborg in Genarp parish, Malmöhus county in 1825 (1F).

In Michelborg he met Anna Hansdotter who was living in Grentinge No. 3 in Genarp parish (1F). They married in 1826 (1F) and moved to Anders’ ‘hometown’ of No. 6 Lyngby (1G). Three years later they move briefly to No. 5 Lyngby (1H) before settling down in Genarp No. 7 in Genarp parish for the next eight years (1I, 1K). During their time in Genarp No. 7, on the 16th of Novemeber, 1836, Nils Andersson was born (1J). In 1838 they moved to Galtesjöhus in Genarp parish (1L). Nils lived with his family in Galtesjöhus for 13 years (1L, 1M, 1N) until he moved away for a year in 1857 to live in Kornheddinge in Kyrkheddinge parish (1O). After Nils moved back home to Galtesjöhus, the family lived there for another nine years (1P, 1Q) before they all moved to Hafslemölla in 1867, the same year Nils married Kjerstina Christensdotter (1R).

A year after Nils’ marriage, Anna Hansdotter died on the 20th of February, 1868 (1R). Seven years later, Anders moves to Genarp No. 6 were he lived until his death on the 27th of September, 1880 (1S, 1T, 1U).

References

1. Sweden, Malmöhus Church Records, 1541-1918; index 1646-1860, images, FamilySearch. Landsarkivet Sverige, Lund (Sweden Regional Archives, Lund).

Born: October 24, 1805 (1A)

Birthplace: Lyngby, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1A)

Baptised: October 30, 1805 (1A)

Baptismal Place: Lyngby, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1A)

Mother: Elna Hansdotter (1A)

Father: Daniel Jorensson (1A)

Wife: Anna Hansdotter (1F)

Married: 1826 (1F)

Marriage Place: Genarp, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1F)

Direct Descendant: Nils Andersson (1J)

Death: September 27, 1880 (1U)

Death Place: Genarp No. 6, Genarp, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) (1U)

Burial Place: unknown (?)
